title: Sword World Peraperaazu
alternative_title: ソード・ワールドぺらぺらーず ; Sword World Peraperaazu ; Sword World: Peraperâs
status: ソード・ワールドぺらぺらーず ; Sword World Peraperaazu ; Sword World: Peraperâs
description:
Description :
        Set in the world of Forcelia, Bellecana is a student at the Academy of Sages in Lomar, Alecrast. She frequently hangs out with Clespo, the elves Shiara and Mallough, and the grassrunner Book, but Bellecana is reluctant to call them their friends. In four short stories Bellecana learns more about herself and the worth of friendships.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4: The Never Ending Epilogue
Vol.1 Chapter 2: Connected Even Through Mist
Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Thief And The Young Noble Sorceress
